Tab.anInt250 = id;

Tab.anInt262 = 4;
Tab.anInt217 = 0;
Tab.anInt220 = 174;
Tab.anInt267 = 11;

Tab.anInt230 = -1;
Tab.aBoolean223 = false;
Tab.aBoolean268 = true;
Tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_243 = wid[idx];
Tab.aString248 = text;
Tab.aString228 = “”;
Tab.anInt232 = color;
Tab.anInt219 = 0;
Tab.anInt216 = 0;
Tab.anInt239 = 0;
}

item.title: [Non-renamed] My Welcome Screen
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

then whats the problem, why doesnt it show, only the play buttons shows
maybe because my customspriteloader directory isnt the same as the 1 u typed?
take a look at my customspriteloader:

private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 CustomSpriteLoader(int i, String s) { long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8) + (long)i; Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l); if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null) { return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1; } try { class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("./Sprites/Interfaces/Custom/"+s+" "+i+".png"); aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2); } catch(Exception exception) { return null; } return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1; }

and yes i have put the sprites, in sprites/interfaces/custom.

item.title: [Non-renamed] My Welcome Screen
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Add this method.

private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 CustomSpriteLoader(int i, String s) 
{
long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8) + (long)i;
Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l);
if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null) {
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}
try {
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("./Files/interface/"+s+" "+i+".png");
aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2);
} catch(Exception exception) {
return null;
}
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}

Read full topic
